description:
Stretchy, quick drying and designed to offer you the freedom to explore further and higher, the Talus Trail Shorts are built with a combination of speed-friendly fabrics. The outer short is made from Matrix™ Aero, their lightest weight Matrix fabric with a featherweight feel and super-fast dry time. The inner liner short is made from a body contouring Flexile™ 100, offering good support and friction management.

They have a deep, stretch waistband for maximum comfort and stitch-free hems to eliminate rubbing during long runs. Keep on moving with a host of tactical pockets for stashing essentials close at hand, like keys, card, snack or phone. The front waistband has a simple stash pocket, there is a pocket on each leg, that will easily fit a phone, and a secure, zipped back pocket, so you can ditch the backpack on shorter runs. Perfect for mountain days, running or fast-hiking over technical terrain.
name: Rab Talus Trail Shorts, 7" Inseam - Mens
